    checkRemoving(int[][]) - Static method in class com.comp2042.logic.MatrixOperations
    Checks for fully completed rows in the matrix, removes them, and computes the corresponding score bonus.
    CLEARLINES - Enum constant in enum class com.comp2042.enums.SaveDataType
     
    ClearRow - Class in com.comp2042.data
    This class represents the result of clearing the rows in the game matrix.
    ClearRow(int, int[][], int) - Constructor for class com.comp2042.data.ClearRow
    Creates a new ClearRow object containing the total lines removed , new board matrix and the scores based ont the number of lines cleared
    clearRows() - Method in interface com.comp2042.interfaces.Board
    Clears any filled rows and returns information about the cleared rows.
    clearRows() - Method in class com.comp2042.logic.SimpleBoard
    Clears filled rows from the board using MatrixOperations and returns ClearRow which contains information about the cleared rows and the new matrix.
    closeSettings() - Method in class com.comp2042.controllers.SettingsController
    Closes the Settings Menu when the user clicks on the close button
    com.comp2042 - package com.comp2042
     
    com.comp2042.controllers - package com.comp2042.controllers
    This package contains the controller classes responsible for handling game logic events, user input, and communication between the UI and backend game systems.

    This package contains classes that stores the data of the Tetris game.

    com.comp2042.logic - package com.comp2042.logic
